Articles.Content:
Hi KSP community!

I have known KSP for quite a while now, from the " professional KSP player" jacksepticeye. But only have I found out that there is a forum. I have only had the honor of playing this exciting game made by Squad once. One of my friends directed me here and we hope to post our structurally unsound but fully functional designs.I really hope this enhances my KSP experience.

Welcome to the forum, and hope you get your own copy soon so you don't have to share your friend's. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) (I don't get a cut. Just saying you'll like it.)
